title: Khrome Werks Chrome Round Sissy Bar 263611
description: • Give your bike the look that you want• Made from 5/8″ round steel• Beautiful duplex nickel chrome plated• Tapped for 1/4-20 screws• Sissy bars bolt on from the outside with button head screws making them easy to change without removing the side plates• Must use with Khrome Werks side plates:• Chrome - 8500126, 900-915, 804-106, 8500118, 8500122, 8500150, 8500125• Black - 212-547, 207-252, 212-550
